name: Wavestone Luxembourg S.A.
goal: Wavestone has a dedicated EU Advisory team, based in both Luxembourg and Brussels. Our team liaises on a regular basis with the EU institutions by carrying out evaluations, impact assessments and policy studies in various business sectors (energy, transport, justice, health, senior citizens, climate, etc.). We also provide technology and programme delivery services in several areas including home affairs, justice, transport and e-Government.
interests: Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
o Evaluations
o Impact Assessments
o Monitoring, reporting, bechmarking sector legislation and policies
o Policy and market studies
o Business Consulting
